类 Student

com.example.project3_studentroster.Student

public class Student extends Object
The super object class that represents a Student.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Student

      public Student(String name, Major major, int credit)
      Constructor that creates a Student. Integrate the name and the major of the student into a profile.
      参数:
      name - of the student to be created.
      major - of the student to be created.
      credit - that the student is taking.

  • 方法详细资料

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Generate all information of a student into one line of String.
      覆盖:
      toString 在类中 Object
      返回:
      info String that contains all information of a student

    • getProfile

      public Profile getProfile()
      Pass the profile of a student, which contains the name and major, out.
      返回:
      profile of a student.

    • getCredit

      public int getCredit()
      Pass the number of credit a student is taking out.
      返回:
      credit number that a student is taking.

    • getTuitionFee

      public double getTuitionFee()
      Pass the amount of total tuition fee a student has.
      返回:
      tuitionFee in total.

    • getFeePaidDate

      public Date getFeePaidDate()
      Pass the date of the last payment out.
      返回:
      feePaidDate of the last payment.

    • getFeePaid

      public double getFeePaid()
      Pass the total amount of fee paid.
      返回:
      feePaid in total.

    • getFulltime

      public boolean getFulltime()
      Pass the status if a student is a fulltime student out.
      返回:
      Fulltime status of a student.

    • setTuitionFee

      public void setTuitionFee(double tuitionFee)
      Change the amount of tuitionFee a student needs to pay.
      参数:
      tuitionFee - the input tuition fee to be stored.

    • setFeePaid

      public void setFeePaid(double feePaid)
      Change the amount of fee a student has paid.
      参数:
      feePaid - the input amount of fee paid.

    • setFeePaidDate

      public void setFeePaidDate(Date feePaidDate)
      Change the date of the last payment.
      参数:
      feePaidDate - the input date when a payment is made.

    • setCredit

      public void setCredit(int credit)
      Change the credit hour of a student.
      参数:
      credit - hour to be updated.

    • payment

      public void payment(double feePaid, Date feePaidDate)
      Perform a payment. Accumulate feePaid, record the date of the last payment, and deduct the total tuition fee.
      参数:
      feePaidDate - the input date when a payment is made.
      feePaid - the input tuition fee to be stored.

    • tuitionDue

      public void tuitionDue()
      Calculate the total fee of an Internation student. A method to be overrided in all sub-classes.

    • setStudyAbroad

      public void setStudyAbroad(boolean studyAbroad)
      Change the status of studyAbroad of an instance and re-calculate fee if necessary. A method to be overrided in International.
      参数:
      studyAbroad - is the status given to change to.

    • setAidAmount

      public void setAidAmount(double aidAmount)
      Change the value of aidAmount of an instance. A method to be overrided in Resident.
      参数:
      aidAmount - is the number of financial aid from input.

    • getArea

      public String getArea()
      Pass the area where the student is from out. A method to be overrided in TriState.
      返回:
      area where the student is from.

    • getStudyAbroad

      public boolean getStudyAbroad()
      Pass the value of studyAbroad out. A method to be overrided in International.
      返回:
      studyAbroad of the instance.

    • getAidAmount

      public double getAidAmount()
      Pass the value of aidAmount out. A method to be overrided in Resident.
      返回:
      aidAmount
